title: ESPN's Tim Bontemps and Tim MacMahon
description:
ESPN's Tim Bontemps joins The Woj Pod to discuss the evolving MVP race and the impact of Robert Williams' injury on the Celtics. Then, ESPN's Tim MacMahon joins to discuss the floundering Jazz and the surging Mavs.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
